Days of Wine and Roses

10 Sep 2013

[audio mp3="http://www.jeffalanfowler.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/days.mp3"][/audio]

Holy crap, remember this guy? Geez.

Jordan lives in New York now. Walking the narrow path. It's so, so, so good to play with him again, after all these years. Little duo gigs here and there... it's a different conversation with ten more years under our fingers, and it feels pretty good.
